        Returns:
        the set of edges connected to the node

      • getPath

        public Path getPath(Node from,
           Node to)
        Using BFS (Breadth First Search) return the path from a any arbitrary node to any other.
        Parameters:
        from - the node from
        to - the node to
        Returns:
        the path to take or null if there is no path.
